item.title: Testimonial from Nathalie Ruano Reyes
item.dc:creator: reluxe
item.content:encoded:
<![CDATA[ â­â­â­â­â­
I recently visited RELUXE Spa with my cousin, and we had an amazing experience getting our Botox treatments done by Hannah and Krista. From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, making us feel right at home.
Hannah and Krista were incredibly professional and knowledgeable. They took the time to explain the procedure, answer all our questions, and ensure we felt comfortable throughout the process. Their attention to detail and skill truly made a difference in our results.
The ambiance of the spa was serene and relaxing, which added to the overall experience. We left feeling rejuvenated and thrilled with our results. I highly recommend ReluxeSpa for anyone looking for high-quality spa services. We can't wait to return!]]>

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
â­â­â­â­â­
I recently visited RELUXE Spa with my cousin, and we had an amazing experience getting our Botox treatments done by Hannah and Krista. From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, making us feel right at home.
Hannah and Krista were incredibly professional and knowledgeable. They took the time to explain the procedure, answer all our questions, and ensure we felt comfortable throughout the process. Their attention to detail and skill truly made a difference in our results.
The ambiance of the spa was serene and relaxing, which added to the overall experience. We left feeling rejuvenated and thrilled with our results. I highly recommend ReluxeSpa for anyone looking for high-quality spa services. We can't wait to return!

item.title: Testimonial from Michelle Goudy
item.dc:creator: reluxe
item.content:encoded:
<![CDATA[Krista and her colleagues are amazing. I felt at ease from the moment I walked into the clinic. Krista and I talked about my concerns. Her recommendation was based on my needs, not on cost. (This was 3 weeks ago, I had to wait since I had a curling iron burn on my forehead).
My first micro needling with PRP session was today. She carefully explained everything during the procedure. I feel blessed that Krista and RELUXE are now a part of my beauty regiment. ]]>

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Krista and her colleagues are amazing. I felt at ease from the moment I walked into the clinic. Krista and I talked about my concerns. Her recommendation was based on my needs, not on cost. (This was 3 weeks ago, I had to wait since I had a curling iron burn on my forehead).
My first micro needling with PRP session was today. She carefully explained everything during the procedure. I feel blessed that Krista and RELUXE are now a part of my beauty regiment.
